sources.title: The Best People | Full Romantic Comedy Movie | Joseph D. Reitman
sources.description:
***This film is under non-exclusive license from Shoreline Entertainment. All rights reserved***

Just as she is recovering from a breakdown, Anna's world is rocked when her younger sister gets engaged. She teams up with the alcoholic best man to break up the engagement; convinced they are trying to save her sister, his best friend, and themselves from a lifetime of misery.

2017
Stars: Joseph D. Reitman, Bianca A. Santos, Elle Evans

Welcome to Movie Central. Subscribe and watch more Awesome Movies.

metadata.Plot: Just as she is recovering from a breakdown, Anna's world is further rocked when her younger sister gets engaged. She teams up with the alcoholic best man to break up the engagement; convinced they are trying to save her sister, his best friend, and themselves from a lifetime of misery.
